content:
That's really helpful, thanks! I think I'll include my website and Twitter handle on my business card, since I'm pretty active on those platforms. I'm also thinking of bringing some copies of my script to AFI Fest, in case I meet anyone who's interested in reading it. Do you think that's a good idea, or should I just focus on networking and not push my script too hard?
assistant<|end_header_id|>
